title: Happy St. Leprechauns Day!
content:
Just dropping by to wish everyone here a happy St. Leprechauns Day!

Don't drink too many cold ones! You won't be able to find the rainbow at the end of the pot of gold then.-----------------------
[url=http://Galaxie.Spatang.com][img]http://img360.imageshack.us/img360/548/blegdandsmeegnewbanner2wf.png[/img][/url]

title: Re: Yeah.
content:
St. Leprechauns, of course. Who else? St. Patrick? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rolleyes.gif[/img]

Only problem is that they don't celebrate it here! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Yeah.
content:
Well, the troubble here is people *do* celebrate it, hard.

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord
